summary: Mission v9.5.7 Testing Complete - All features verified: Pixel alignment (header-video gap is -8px), Réserver button visible when maintenance OFF, Scroll working (sessions section and footer accessible), 9:16 video format, Super Admin access for both emails.

issues: Video shows placeholder clapperboard icon when no actual video configured - expected behavior for partners without video

critical_code_review_comments: ✅ PartnersCarousel.js L121-175: PartnerVideoCard receives maintenanceMode and isSuperAdmin props
✅ PartnersCarousel.js L137: isBlocked = maintenanceMode && !isSuperAdmin correctly blocks non-super-admin users
✅ PartnersCarousel.js L327-341: Réserver button hidden when isBlocked=true
✅ PartnersCarousel.js L148-175: handleVideoClick blocks double-click when isBlocked
✅ PartnersCarousel.js L177-185: handleReserve blocks navigation when isBlocked
✅ PartnersCarousel.js L555-560: handleNavigate blocks vitrine access when maintenance ON
✅ PartnersCarousel.js L202: Video paddingTop: 32px positions video close to header
✅ CoachDashboard.js L3941-3957: Logout button has position:fixed, top:12px, right:12px, z-index:9999
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission v9.5.7 verified. All features working: 1) Pixel alignment with video paddingTop:32px and header paddingTop:2px, 2) Quick Control mode blocks interactions when maintenance=true except for Super Admin, 3) Logout button is position:fixed with z-index:9999 (requires login to see), 4) Scroll working - users can scroll from Reels to Sessions/Footer.
